alert.note: Alert for Freeborn (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Freeborn County through 645 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Albert Lea, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clarks Grove around 635 PM CDT. Hayward around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hollandale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 8 and 21. Interstate 90 between mile markers 148 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
